languages.text: "Горжусь тобой, {name}. Ты стал{mf||а} достойн{mf|ым|ой} преемни{mf|ком|цей} — и может быть даже лучш{mf|им|ей} Лорд-капитаном".
"I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Горжусь тобой, {name}. Ты стал{mf||а} достойн{mf|ым|ой} преемни{mf|ком|цей} — и может быть даже лучш{mf|им|ей} Лорд-капитаном".

traits.locale_text: "I'm proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."
"I'm proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."
"I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."
"I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."
"I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."

languages.text: “我为你感到自豪，{name}。你已经证明自己是合格的继承人——或许，是有史以来最英明的领主舰长。”
languages.original_text: "I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “我为你感到自豪，{name}。你已经证明自己是合格的继承人——或许，是有史以来最英明的领主舰长。”

languages.text: «Estoy orgullosa de ti, {name}. Te has convertido en {mf|un digno sucesor|una digna sucesora}; quizá incluso seas mejor Lord Capitán de lo que fui yo».
languages.original_text: "I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy orgullosa de ti, {name}. Te has convertido en {mf|un digno sucesor|una digna sucesora}; quizá incluso seas mejor Lord Capitán de lo que fui yo».

languages.text: « Je suis fière de vous, {name}. Vous faites {mf|un excellent successeur|une excellente successeure} et vous deviendrez sans doute {mf|le plus grand des seigneurs-capitaines|la plus grande des seigneures-capitaines}. »
languages.original_text: "I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis fière de vous, {name}. Vous faites {mf|un excellent successeur|une excellente successeure} et vous deviendrez sans doute {mf|le plus grand des seigneurs-capitaines|la plus grande des seigneures-capitaines}. »

languages.text: "Ich bin stolz auf Euch, {name}. Ihr seid {mf|ein würdiger Nachfolger|eine würdige Nachfolgerin} geworden – und vielleicht sogar der beste Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin stolz auf Euch, {name}. Ihr seid {mf|ein würdiger Nachfolger|eine würdige Nachfolgerin} geworden – und vielleicht sogar der beste Lord Captain."

languages.text: 「誇りに思うぞ、{name}。お前は立派な後継者になった。おそらく最高のロード・キャプテンにすらなれるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「誇りに思うぞ、{name}。お前は立派な後継者になった。おそらく最高のロード・キャプテンにすらなれるだろう」

languages.text: "Seninle gurur duyuyorum {name}. Göreve yaraşır bir halef oldun, hatta belki en iyi Lord Kaptan olabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "I am proud of you, {name}. You have become a worthy successor — and perhaps even the best Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Seninle gurur duyuyorum {name}. Göreve yaraşır bir halef oldun, hatta belki en iyi Lord Kaptan olabilirsin."
